column3: News;Kandal:------Â Deputy Inspector of the Kandal Traffic police said that a sand dredging ship collided with a fishing boat
column4: causing the death of a 2 year old boy.------The incident is happened on 13 January 2019 near Prek Thong village
column7: Kandal province.------The accident happened between dredging boat opened by a Vietnamese crew
column8: which collided with a small fishing boat with a family on board
column9: causing a boy on the smaller vessel to fall into the river and drown. His body has not yet been recovered.------The captain of the larger boat is being questioned over the incident. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/404521
